definitions: in a way that is required by law or a rule

examples.text: every dog that is neutered is compulsorily vaccinated against rabies

shortDefinitions: in way that is required by law or rule

definitions: in a way that involves the officially enforced sale of privately owned land or property for public use

examples.text: the council has been given the go-ahead to compulsorily purchase the three remaining flats

shortDefinitions: in way that involves sale of privately owned land for public use
